channel.title: Nordgarden
channel.description: Nordgarden is a Norwegian artist deriving from the American old school of classic songwriting.

item.title: Solo acoustic tour of Italy - March 2011
item.dc:creator: michiel
item.content:encoded: Nordgarden will be back for a solo acoustic tour in the Southern part of Italy presenting the new single "Keep It Shining On The Inside". You may see dates on this site under the "Live"-section. This site is still under improvement, but we´re getting there, slowly but surely. You are always welcome to send any suggestions on improvements to this email address: giardinodelnord@gmail.com The new album is still in the making, but is very close to complete and I look forward to present it to all of you this Autumn of 2011. Meanwhile I wish you an early, blooming and creative Spring. Best, Terje Nordgarden

wp:comment.wp:comment_content: looking forward to see you again on 6 februari in Arnhem :D
Having fun? I've got you linked from my site dude!

item.title: Back in NYC
item.dc:creator: Nordgarden
item.content:encoded:
I´m more than excited to announce that I´m back in NYC and that I will be playing my first gig at the Rockwood Music Hall - www.rockwoodmusichall.com - this coming Tuesday on April 26th at 7pm - Yeah, RnR in the big city!
I will play additional gigs in NYC, Philadelphia and Boston until May 7th. You may check out the various dates in the "Live"-section elsewhere on this website. It´s up to you New York, New York!

wp:comment.wp:comment_content: Hey, like these songs my brotther. Keep it real at the dalsløkka. Crying witn your songs, think that is a good sign.

item.title: A live postcard from NYC
item.dc:creator: Nordgarden
item.content:encoded:
I´m just home again in Oslo and I am so grateful to have my own little flat and my own little bed. Here´s a little memory from my current mini-tour of the US - a live postcard from Brooklyn, NYC:
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=-UA8PtBTEuA&feature=share
Wish you all a wonderful Spring!
XO, Terje Nordgarden

item.title: The new single "Keep It Shining On The Inside" Out now on Itunes!
item.dc:creator: Nordgarden
item.content:encoded: The new single "Keep It Shining On The Inside" has just been released on Itunes, Amazon, Wimp etc.    This is a little summer wishing well to all of you and it´s the first single from my forthcoming album "You Gotta Get Ready" which is due for release late 2011. And it´s finally my first official release in three years - enjoy! Here´s also a live shot of Nordgarden playing the song "Keep It Shining On The Inside" on the beach in Siracusa, Sicily: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=zQxN6xGt2Ko

item.title: Nordgarden - in anteprima su Rolling Stone
item.dc:creator: Nordgarden
item.content:encoded: Il nuovo disco di Nordgarden "You Gotta Get Ready" è in anteprima su Rolling Stone Magazine da oggi. Ci sono tre canzoni in streaming + un anteprima del primo video e singolo "Keep It Shining on the Inside". Buon ascolto e a presto col tour a febbraio! Vedete le date QUI.

item.title: Nordgarden - live @ Rai 2
item.dc:creator: Nordgarden

item.title: Nordgarden - live @ TV 8 (Norway)
item.dc:creator: Nordgarden
item.content:encoded: Nordgarden will be appearing live at TV 8 in Norway on Thursday 23 February. He will be doing a live rendition of the new single "These Lovesick Blues". You can see it all live on TV 8 at 5:30 pm tomorrow night.

item.title: Great reviews on "You Gotta Get Ready"
item.dc:creator: Nordgarden
item.content:encoded:
The new album "You Gotta Get Ready" is finally out in Norway and Italy and the press has been responding enthusiastically and very positive. This is what they´ve been saying about it in the respective countries: - NORWAY -  * AFTENPOSTEN: 5/6 - Convincing, effortless and steady - a singer songwriter of international standards. * TELEMARKS AVISA: 5/6 -  This album is a treasure! * STAVANGER AFTENBLAD: 5/6 - Songs with a silent power. * FÆDRELANDSVENNEN: 5/6 - The upturn! With his exceptional skills as a songwriter, he manages to stick out from the rest. * HAMAR ARBEIDERBLAD: 5/6 -  Full control - never has his musical style and his self confidence as an artist come through as clear and convincing as on this album. - ITALY - RUMORE: The fourth album of the Norwegian has hit spot on!
ROCKERILLA: Ballads of contaminating musicality. 
BLOW UP: When the sound and the production is as sparse as on YGGR, the songwriting must be of such standards and quality that it sustains the entire album - in front of this immensely difficult task Nordgarden stands the test.
JAM: Not singing along to the choruses on "Keep It Shining on the Inside" or "These Lovesick Blues" is almost impossible, and without noticing it you are conquered.

item.title: Riparte il tour "You Gotta Get Ready" in Italia!
item.dc:creator: Nordgarden
item.content:encoded: Mercoledì 18.aprile riparte il tour “You Gotta Get Ready” di Nordgarden da Pisa.Farà la seconda parte del suo tour in Italia – stavolta da solista in acustico presentando i brani del nuovo disco con la sua chitarra Martin, un loop station e le sue harmoniche blues. Il quarto album di Nordgarden è stato accolto molto bene in Italia e Norvegia e a maggio esce anche in Ollanda. In Italia è stato presentato in anteprima su Rolling Stone Magazine e da Silvia Boschero al suo programma “Moby Dick” su Radio Rai 2. Vedete le nuove date QUI.

item.title: New video out on Vanity Fair!
item.dc:creator: Nordgarden
item.content:encoded: The new Nordgarden-video of the song "These Lovesick Blues" from the recent album "You Gotta Get Ready" is just out- exclusively on the Italian edition of Vanity Fair. Check it out - HERE - enjoy!

item.title: Tour and new album out in the Netherlands!
item.dc:creator: Nordgarden
item.content:encoded: Tomorrow, on May 3rd, Nordgarden is finally be back to visit his beloved Netherlands. He will be presenting his new album "You Gotta Get Ready" to his Dutch crowd. The album has received great reviews in Norway and Italy and will now be out in Dutch stores from tomorrow. Nordgarden will also be doing ten concerts around the Netherlands and on May 4th he´ll be guesting Giel Beelens night show NachteGiel  at 3FM. The show will also be broadcasted via TV - HERE. See links and more info on Nordgardens website www.nordgarden.info. Meanwhile you may check out the two first official videos from the new album: * "These Lovesick Blues" - out exclusively on the Italian edition of Vanity Fair. * "Keep It Shining on the Inside" - filmed on the sunny beaches of Rimini, Italy.

item.title: Nordgarden @ NachteGiel w/Giel Beelen on May 4th

item.content:encoded:
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=pbogxPXkxoA
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=8DeMuCuXxO0
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=T3MvvhCrL1c

item.title: Norwegian Tour
item.dc:creator: Nordgarden
item.content:encoded: Nordgarden er tilbake i Norge - tilbake fra hans nye hjem på Sicilia - for å turnere gamlelandet og for å presentere sitt nye album "You Gotta Get Ready". Dette er hans fjerde plate og den har fått gode kritikker over hele linja: --------------------------<wbr>------------------------- * AFTENPOSTEN: 5/6 - Overbevisende, enkelt og stødig – en sanger/låtskriver av internasjonalt format. * TELEMARKS AVISA: 5/6 – En juvel av et album! * STAVANGER AFTENBLAD: 5/6 - Sanger med stille styrke. * FÆDRELANDSVENNEN: 5/6 – Oppturen – ved hjelp av sine usedvanlige evner som låtsnekker, klarer han å stikke seg ut. * HAMAR ARBEIDERBLAD: 5/6 – Full kontroll – aldri har egenarten og sikkerheten hans som artist framstått tydeligere enn nå. --------------------------<wbr>------------------------- Med en akustisk Martin-gitar, en Boss-loop station og diverse munnspill leverer Nordgarden et energisk solo-show med folk, country og blues som klare referanser.</wbr></wbr>

item.title: Nordgarden @ "Il Volo Del Mattino"- Radio Deejay
item.dc:creator: Nordgarden
item.content:encoded: Da settimana prossima - 28.maggio - la canzone "You Gotta Get Ready" del nuovo disco di NORDGARDEN sarà in rotazione sul "Volo Del Mattino" - il programma radiofonico condotto da FABIO VOLO, in onda dal Lunedì al Venerdì alle 9.00 su RADIO DEEJAY. Potete seguirlo su questi link: * http://www.deejay.it/dj/radio/programma/14/Il-Volo-del-mattino * http://www.facebook.com/volodelmattino E se vi piace vi prego di sintonizzarvi sul programma, spammarlo e mandare messaggi a Radio Deejay sull'apprezzamento del brano :)

item.content:encoded:
The new video of the single "These Lovesick Blues" is out now on YouTube. It was filmed in Giarre, Sicily and directed by Riccardo Napoli (Blissard Multimedia).
http://youtu.be/ioYwLp2PKBY

item.title: Nordgarden - på URØRT
item.dc:creator: Nordgarden
item.content:encoded: Nordgarden har endelig fått ordnet seg en artistside på Nrk P3´s URØRT. Det er blitt lagt ut tre låter fra den nye plata til fri nedlastning og diverse videoer. Velbekomme - http://www.nrk.no/urort/Artist/Nordgarden1

item.title: Live pics from Catania & greetings from Sicily!
item.dc:creator: Nordgarden
item.content:encoded:
Here´s a few photos from my gig last Sunday at the Ostello in Catania. Thanks a many to Ennio Florio for a great job!
[gallery]

item.title: Nordgarden - live @ "Caterpillar" on Rai Radio 2
item.dc:creator: Nordgarden
item.content:encoded: Nordgarden will be guesting the program Caterpillar on national Italian Radio Rai 2. It is one of the more important and attended music programs on Italian radio. Nordgarden will be presenting his recent album "You Gotta Get Ready" playing three songs from the album fully acoustically and he´ll do an interview talking of present and future projects. It can all be captured on October 31st at 6:30 pm on RAI Radio 2: http://caterpillar.blog.rai.it/ Follow the event on FB - HERE.

item.title: Netherlands - last concerts
item.dc:creator: Nordgarden
item.content:encoded:
Tonights show in Nijmegen is sold out - so the last chance for a concert with Nordgarden in the Netherlands this time around will be in Ede tomorrow or in Helmond on Sunday. The gig in Ede is a house concert and you may participate by sending an email to JeeWee who is running the session on email: music@sugarbeat.nl

item.title: On tour - back in Italy!
item.dc:creator: Nordgarden
item.content:encoded: Next week Nordgarden will be back in Italy doing another lap of his "You Gotta Get Ready" - tour from Piacenza in the North to Catania in the South. Check out the live-section for dates and more current info. RnR!

item.title: New dates & changes

item.content:encoded: The Nordgarden 2013-tour continues down South in Italy in the Puglia region. There has been a change of venue on Thursdays gig on January 31st. The new venue is ARCI Calypso in Sava (TA). The next live appointments will be as following: Jan 30 -  Cerignola @ Safarà - 10 pm Jan 31 -  Sava (TA) @ ARCI Calypso - 10 pm Feb 01 -  Trani @ Santo Graal - 10 pm Feb 02 -  Gioia del Colle (BA) @ Arci Lebowski - 10 pm Feb 03 -  Canosa di Puglia @ Excalibur - 10 pm

item.title: Nordgarden - Italian Tour 2013

item.content:encoded: Nordgarden will be back on the road tomorrow night to embrace the Italian continent playing a set of 9 concerts around the country from Varese up North to Sorrento down South. Presenting the recent album "You Gotta Get Ready" which is also accessible on Itunes:  https://itunes.apple.com/us/album/you-gotta-get-ready/id502874072 The tour:  Apr 11 – Lugagnano @ Emporio Malkovich @ Bellons Jazz Pub Apr 12 – Carpi (MO) @ Kalinka Apr 13 – Medicina @ 3 Bicchieri  Apr 14 – Casale Monferrato (AL) @ Pantagruel  Apr 15 – Varese @ Twiggy Club  Apr 16 – Pozzolengo (BS) @ House Concert Apr 17 – Bologna @ Rockcafe  Apr 18 – TBA Apr 19 – Pescara @ Tipografia – (w/ GIURADEI)  Apr 20 – TBA Apr 21 – Sorrento @ House concert For further info on how to partecipate on the private house concerts write an email @ giardindelnord@gmail.com.

item.title: Nordgarden - German Tour 2013
item.dc:creator: Nordgarden
item.content:encoded: Nordgarden is already head deep into his German tour and have played four great shows + spending four great nights in Hasselt, Wesel and Hamburg. This is the first German tour and presentation of the new album "You Gotta Get Ready". The tour continues this Thursday in Berlin and the next dates are as follows: May 02 – Berlin @ Hard Rock Café May 03 – Gottingen @ Apex Kultur May 04 – Mainz @ Schon Schon - 8:30 pm May 07 – Offenburg @ 361 Grad // Spitalkeller - w/Todd Thibaud May 08 – Nurnberg @ KUF im Südpunkt See you down the road!

item.title: Norwegian Tour 2013
item.dc:creator: Nordgarden
item.content:encoded:
Nordgarden is back in Norway to continue his ”You Gotta Get Ready”-tour.
The record was released early 2012 on GDN Records/MO and received great critical reviews.
The Norwegian press wrote among other:* “Convincing, plain and steady – a songwriter of international standards.” - 5/6 - AFTENPOSTEN * “This album is a treasure!” - 5/6 - TELEMARKS AVISAThe Norwegian part of the tour this time goes to the deep South
of Kristiansand to the far North of Kjøllefjord:
------------------------------------------------------------------------------16.05 - Hamar @ Docile Pub & Kontor – 9pm (early start) 24.05 – Kragerø @ Jensemann Pub – 10pm 25.05 – Lillesand @ Brygga – 3pm 25.05 – Kristiansand @ Six Pence – 10pm 26.05 – Stavanger @ Bøker & Børst – 9pm (early start) 28.05 – Trondheim @ Familien – 10pm 01.06 – Kjøllefjord @ Kjøllefjord Hotel – 10pm 02.06 – Kjøllefjord @ Kjøllefjord Hotel – 10pm------------------------------------------------------------------------------- * Follow the tour on FACEBOOK:
https://www.facebook.com/events/489866661084583
* Check out the new record on ITUNES:
https://itunes.apple.com/us/album/you-gotta-get-ready/id502874072* Check out the video of the single ”These Lovesick Blues” on YOUTUBE:
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ioYwLp2PKBY

item.title: Mini-Norges-turne
item.dc:creator: Nordgarden
item.content:encoded:
Nordgarden kommer hjem til Norge en liten tur for å spille på årets Under Brua Festival på Hamar. I tillegg blir det to konserter i Oslo og på Kongsvinger. På Hamar og i Oslo har han med seg band med rytmeseksjonen fra Margfolket - Thomas Sandviken på trommer og Endre Koch på bass. På Kongsvinger blir det solo-show med loop-station, munnspill og diverse. - Konsertene:
----------------------------------------------- 20.08: Oslo @ Per på hjørnet - kl 22:00 http://www.pph.oslo.no/program.html 23.08: Hamar @ Under Brua Festivalen - kl 21:00 http://www.underbrua.no/ 24.08: Kongsvinger @ Festningen "Slaveriet" - kl 14:00 http://www.kongsvinger.kommune.no/no/innholdsmeny-bunn/utviklingsprosjekter/kongsvinger-festning/

item.title: DIECI - the new album in Italian!
item.dc:creator: Nordgarden
item.content:encoded: DIECI - is the new Nordgarden album due to release on November 22nd. It´s an album all in italian paying tribute to the Italian alternative music scene and to a country that has been like a home to Nordgarden the last 10 years. Actually the album is a celebration - a 10 year anniversary since his first album was produced by the epic artist and producer Paolo Benvegnù in Florence back in 2003. Since then Nordgarden has played over 500 concerts just in Italy and have gotten to know a great deal of people and artists along the way. On DIECI Nordgarden pays tribute to ten of these artists by interpreting a song of each. This is a best-of, not of Nordgarden, but a best-of of his Italian friends and artists. This is a tribute to the country, a tribute to it´s language and most of all a tribute to it´s music. It´s a big thank you. A big GRAZIE! The album has been recorded in Zen Arcade studios in Catania and is produced by Cesare Basile. It will be out on GDN Records/Audioglobe. For further information read Audioglobes communication HERE. The tracklist of the album is as follows: 01. Non è la California (Marco Iacampo – Iacampo/Supermota SAS) 02. La mia rivoluzione (Marco Parente – Parente/Esse Quattro) 03. Invisibile (Cristina Donà – Donà/ Warner Chappell) 04. Cerchi nell’acqua (Paolo Benvegnù – Benvegnù/Warner Chappell) 05. Le canzoni dei cani (Cesare Basile – Basile/Unomundo) 06. Miele (Paolo Mei) 07. L’abbandono (Marta Sui Tubi - Gulino, Pipitone/Warner Chappell) 08. Dove mi perdo (Grazia Di Michele - Di Michele, Cristina Villani, Raffaele Petrangeli/GDM edizioni) 09. La realtà non esiste (Claudio Rocchi – Rocchi/Universal-Ariston) 10. L’invasore (Andrea Franchi – Franchi/Warner Chappell)   ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

item.title: Nuovo video in uscita esclusivamente per Rolling Stone Magazine!
item.dc:creator: Nordgarden
item.content:encoded: Oggi esce in esclusiva per Rolling Stone il primo video e singolo di NORDGARDEN del brano NON È LA CALIFORNIA scritto da Marco Iacampo. Grazie dal cuore a Giovanni Tomaselli & co, a Cesare Basile, Marcello Caudullo, Massimo Ferrarotto, Marco Iacampo, Sebastiano D´Amico e Fleisch Ufficio Stampa per aver aiutati a realizzare questo progetto! Guardalo qui: http://www.rollingstonemagazine.it/musica/news-musica/esclusiva-video-terje-nordgarden-canta-in-italiano/

item.title: Free streaming of the new album DIECI for a week!
item.dc:creator: Nordgarden
item.content:encoded: Listen to the new album DIECI (in Italian) for free for a week at the Italian XL Repubblica website: http://xl.repubblica.it/brani-musicali/terje-nordgarden-dieci-lo-streaming/7621/

item.title: DIECI - on tour
item.dc:creator: Nordgarden
item.content:encoded: Il DIECI-tour di NORDGARDEN continua nel nuovo anno dopo una grande risposta sia da stampa e pubblico nel 2013. Questa settimana ci saranno date a Piacenza, Firenze, Casale Monferrato e Desenzano. Ecco le prossime date del tour: 16.01 – Piacenza @ Baciccia 17.01 – Firenze @ Le Murate 18.01 – Casale Monferrato (AL) @ Pantagruel 19.01 – Desenzano (BS) @ House Concert - (ore 21:00) (per partecipare scrivete a giardinodelnord@gmail.com) 22.01 – Cosenza @ Acquario Bistrot 23.01 – Catanzaro @ Paddy´s 26.01 - Riposto (CT) @ CubaLibro

item.title: First video & single from DIECI
item.dc:creator: Nordgarden
item.content:encoded: The first video and single - NON È LA CALIFORNIA - from the new album DIECI is freshly out on Youtube. The song was written by my great friend and artist MARCO IACAMPO and he kindly gave me his permission to rearrange it - making it slightly rougher, slightly tougher and slightly more Nordgarden. Here you go: http://youtu.be/83OIrw0AjgY

item.title: Live in Germany
item.dc:creator: Nordgarden
item.content:encoded: Nordgarden will be back in Germany this week for another tour and presentation of the critically acclaimed album "YOU GOTTA GET READY". These are the dates: 29.01 – Göttingen @ Apex 30.01 – Holzminden @ Internat Solling 31.01 – Bad Frankenhausen @ Panorama Museum 01.02 – Berlin @ Malena Bar 02.02 – Hamburg @ Filmraum 05.02 – Kiel @ Prinz Willy 06.02 – Hamburg @ Freundlich & Kompetent 07.02 – Dresden @ Dreikönigskirche “MZDW” 08.02 – Meiningen @ Kunsthaus Meiningen Follow the tour on FACEBOOK

item.title: New video from the new album DIECI
item.dc:creator: Nordgarden
item.content:encoded: A few months ago we - me and the super team at Matriosca - filmed a live performance in Florence in the former prison Le Murate. I chose to perform "Le Canzoni dei Cani" -  a song from my new album DIECI , written by the great sicilian artist and songwriter Cesare Basile. Hope you enjoy it: http://youtu.be/Rc-fLsWAe_A

item.title: New video - a duet with MARCO PARENTE
item.dc:creator: Nordgarden
item.content:encoded:
A few months ago we filmed and recorded this live in Firenze @ Caffe Murate. The event was a special one having the legendary Italian artist MARCO PARENTE up on stage with me to do a duet on his masterpiece "La Mia Rivoluzione" - a wonderful song I also recorded on my last album DIECI. Thanks to Francesco Piotti at RECKLESS PROJECT for the great work he's put down in this video!
http://youtu.be/7qO4Lu5rxew

item.title: European Tour!
item.dc:creator: Nordgarden
item.content:encoded:
Nordgarden will  be doing a European tour in the Netherlands, Norway and Germany. 
Still presenting his critically acclaimed album YOU GOTTA GET READY (available on ITUNES here), he will also be doing bits and pieces of his new album DIECI (available on ITUNES here) - all in Italian. One man, one Martin guitar, one loop station and a great amount of energy!
Follow the tour on FACEBOOK:  https://www.facebook.com/events/238686932988521/

item.title: A sweet, little Norwegian Summer tune.
item.dc:creator: Nordgarden
item.content:encoded: Here´s a beautiful, little Norwegian Summer tune for you - a song that I wrote together with the Norwegian bluegrass band - Finnskogen jakt og strengelag. Have a nice Summer! http://open.spotify.com/album/6V5WAOGwZQCEQS55GHJE2p

item.dc:creator: Nordgarden
item.content:encoded: Here's a new live video of Nordgarden and Iacampo singing together on "Non è la California" at the Teatro del Pane in Treviso, Italy. <iframe width="560" height="315" src="//www.youtube.com/embed/aZkq5m10uNY" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen></iframe>

item.title: Vote THE PATH OF LOVE - best Norwegian song
item.dc:creator: Nordgarden
item.content:encoded: Help voting the Nordgarden song - The Path of Love - the best Norwegian song of all times. Enter at this link and click the heart, like and play the song as much as you like. <iframe src="http://www.ostlendingen.no/vis/bandwagon/embeds/player?playlist=9421868&playlistTitle=The%20Path%20of%20Love" frameborder="0" width="100%" height="400"></iframe>

item.title: Thunder Road
item.dc:creator: Nordgarden
item.content:encoded:
I'm proud and happy to announce that my first BRUCE SPRINGSTEEN tribute is out on a compilation by the French label My Music Factory today!
My rendition of THUNDER ROAD may be streamed and downloaded on the link below together with a bunch of other great artists - all for free. Enjoy! <iframe src="https://mymusicfactory.bandcamp.com/album/tramps-like-us-bruce-springsteen-tribute" width="600" height="380" frameborder="0" allowtransparency="true"></iframe>

item.title: New song: A MERRY OLD CHRISTMAS
item.dc:creator: Nordgarden
item.content:encoded:
I´m happy to announce my first (and probably last.. ;) Christmas-song ever. It has the very original title "A MERRY OLD CHRISTMAS". With this I wish you all a wonderful December - enjoy and appreciate the precious time you get with your friends and family!
You may find it out on ITUNES: <iframe src="https://itunes.apple.com/it/album/a-merry-old-christmas-single/id945802645?l=en" width="600" height="380" frameborder="5" allowtransparency="true"></iframe>
It´s also out on SPOTIFY: <iframe src="https://embed.spotify.com/?uri=spotify:album:6IkkdIE0j6dV4YWVtR2SCL" width="300" height="95" frameborder="5" allowtransparency="true"></iframe>

item.title: New video: "A Merry Old Christmas"
item.dc:creator: Nordgarden
item.content:encoded:
It´s finally here - the official video of my new song - A MERRY OLD CHRISTMAS. Filmed in Acitrezza, Sicily by Giovanni Tomaselli & Rosario Samuel Adonia - thanks guys! The video also has a special guest - Maya Nordgarden! A merry ol´Christmas to you all!
<iframe width="600" height="400" src="//www.youtube.com/embed/phujbtP9J_Y" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen></iframe>
Music video by Nordgarden performing A Merry Old Christmas. (C) 2014 Terje Nordgarden
Title: A Merry Old Christmas Artist: Nordgarden Web: https://www.nordgarden.info Directors: Giovanni Tomaselli & Rosario S.Adonia Web: https://www.facebook.com/giovannitom
Get the song in ITUNES: https://itunes.apple.com/it/album/a-merry-old-christmas-single/id945802645?l=en
The artist about the song: -------------------------------------
A Merry Old Christmas was written at three o´clock in the morning on Christmas Eve. The whole house was asleep except for me and I sat down in the living room with a guitar, a cup of hot tea and out came this song, soaking in the absolute silence of the night, the utter dark and the snow covered Norwegian landscape outside.
The year was 2012 and we had just overcome another doomsday prediction, my baby girl Maya had just been born two months earlier and was now to celebrate her first Christmas. The nostalgia of many a Christmases celebrated in this my mothers house ran through my mind like a cine film, having seen how the world had changed and how a new child, my child, had now become a part of this world and of the great tradition that Christmas is. Present in the song is also the darkness, the fear of a dangerous world on the outside that I as a father want to protect her from.
All in all this is my first Christmas song ever. It all came very natural and I feel it is my tribute to childhood, my family and to Christmas as a source of light, warmth, love and inspiration to get through our long and dark Norwegian Winters.
The Lyrics: ---------------- It’s so cold The silence is white And Christmas so bold With its bright neon lights
Outside there’s a dark We’ ve all gone to bed But I’m wide awake Floating around in my head It’s a Merry Old, Merry Old Christmas again this year
Now we’ve overcome The end of the World The Earth didn’t drown And the globe still turns
Yes, we’ve overcome The trouble in store Our blood still runs And the flame still burns It’s a Merry Old, Merry Old Christmas again this year
My baby’s asleep She’s safe from the World All here is peace I’m pretty sure

item.title: New album - LIVE IN DRESDEN - out on April 7th!
item.dc:creator: Nordgarden
item.content:encoded: This is the front cover of my new album - Live in Dresden - to be released on April 7, 2015. This is my first live album ever recorded in the gorgeous Dreikonigs Church in Dresden on February 2nd, 2014. Thanks to Federica Gambacciani for the photo, to Roberta Incantasciato for the artwork. More news coming up soon!

item.dc:creator: Nordgarden
item.content:encoded: Here´s a new video from a sunny day at Balcony TV Trieste​ - good to watch on a rainy day in Oslo :) The song is all new - titled "HERE WE GO AGAIN" - enjoy! - https://youtu.be/HId_2lzD0Yg

item.content:encoded: The new album - LIVE IN DRESDEN - is out on ITUNES and all other digital platforms!

item.title: On Tour in Italy!
item.dc:creator: Nordgarden
item.content:encoded: Nordgarden will be back in Italy to do a few more shows presenting the current album LIVE IN DRESDEN. Here are the dates: ------------------- Oct 08 – Montichiari (BS) @ I Love Cocaine Oct 09 – Bassano del Grappa @ Rive Jazz Club Oct 10 – Brescia @ Da Nacio Oct 11 – Rodengo-Saiano (BS) @ Alberodonte Oct 13 – Firenze @ Le Murate Oct 14 – Grosseto @ Faq - Live Music Club Oct 15 – Torino @ Officine Corsari Oct 16 – Treviso @ Eden Cafe Oct 17 – Livorno @ Ex Cinema Aurora Oct 18 – Casale Monferrato @ Circolo Pantagruel

item.title: A Christmas Song: "A Merry Old Christmas"
item.dc:creator: Nordgarden
item.content:encoded:
It's getting closer to Christmas and that makes it suitable to post my only Christmas song - A MERRY OLD CHRISTMAS. I hope you enjoy it and I hope that you may have a peaceful and meaningful time with good friends and family this coming time of the year.
https://youtu.be/phujbtP9J_Y

item.title: Sign up on my SPOTIFY-account!

item.content:encoded: Please add yourself up to my SPOTIFY account to keep yourself updated on my music and also get total access to all of my music:

item.title: Spotify playlist
item.dc:creator: Nordgarden
item.content:encoded:
So - being pretty sick of spending all of this morning trying to figure a way into Spotifys great playlists I've just about had enough of vasting my time.
So I just made my own playlist entitled NORWEGIAN MUSIC BUDDIES. And yes - it's a collection of most of my great Norwegian artist friends (let me know if I left anyone out!) Hope you enjoy it! And hope you have a great weekend listening to it!
Link: https://open.spotify.com/…/…/playlist/3SqXonIcORWNocY1w3Gx0N
<iframe src="https://embed.spotify.com/?uri=spotify%3Auser%3A1193076522%3Aplaylist%3A3SqXonIcORWNocY1w3Gx0N" width="300" height="380" frameborder="0" allowtransparency="true"></iframe>

item.title: New single out November 4th!
item.dc:creator: Nordgarden
item.content:encoded: The new single YOU MUST BE THE CHANGE is ready for release tomorrow on SPOTIFY and all digital platforms! https://open.spotify.com/artist/2yLSBMXR6j2svRJtsIn2Cz

item.title: Wide Open Spaces - the new single
item.dc:creator: Nordgarden
item.content:encoded:
We just released the second single - Wide Open Spaces - from my forthcoming album "Changes" (september 2017 / GDN Rec/Musikkoperatørene)
I wrote this song far into the Norwegian mountains with the mighty talented Claudia Scott. And I think it might just be the most beautiful song I've written so far.
It went straight onto high rotation on national Norwegian radio NRK P1 this week and you may listen to it on Spotify and all other digital platforms. Enjoy!
<iframe src="https://embed.spotify.com/?uri=spotify%3Atrack%3A3hWO05XLS4NvbLbsHZXA2u" width="300" height="380" frameborder="0" allowtransparency="true"></iframe>

item.title: Songwriting on Bornholm
item.dc:creator: Nordgarden
item.content:encoded: Det har vært en fantastisk uke på Bornholm så langt, med særs dyktige låtskrivere. 6 låter på tre dager og flere er på vei - på norsk faktisk! Takk så mye til NOPA og DPA for denne gaven! #nopanorge #voresmusik #nordisksangskriveruge #dpa_musik

item.title: Dutch Radio 2
item.dc:creator: Nordgarden
item.content:encoded:
My new single "Side of the Road" is being played frequently on Dutch Radio 2. Check it out!
https://www.facebook.com/annemiekeschollaardt/videos/1586587321397365/?hc_ref=ARRyRAQa-Wk_Tokt9AogClgmonQjIiruZ0ijFNPgVM8j8fLeKUvZeyGQ7awd9Sw1Gy0&pnref=story

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value:
AAP week 40: Nordgarden - 'Side Of The Road'

Mijn favoriete plaat van de week: Nordgarden met 'Side Of The Road'. Nordgarden heeft ook een voornaam, Terje. En hij komt uit Noorwegen (what gave it away…) Zijn nieuwe album Changes is net uit, en daar staat deze op: 'Side Of The Road'. Klassieke Amerikaanse singer songwriting, maar er zit wel degelijk een Scandinavische tintje aan. En oh ja, het is heel mooi! Check 'm helemaal in m'n Spotify-playlist: https://open.spotify.com/user/radio2nl/playlist/5oPKSs2zPrrzQTIp2lliIP

Opslået af Annemieke Schollaardt på 2. oktober 2017

item.title: Nordgarden opening up for a-ha
item.dc:creator: Nordgarden

item.title: Nordgarden playing the Royal Albert Hall
item.dc:creator: Nordgarden
item.content:encoded: Nordgarden has received the amazing news that he will be playing the Royal Albert Hall on November 10th 2019 together with Norwegian blues legends such as Amund Maarud, Knut Reiersrud & Vidar Busk and more. The concert will be a celebration of 20 years of the blues label Blue Mood. The news was recently published in the Norwegian newspaper Hamar Dagblad. Read more: [caption id="attachment_1699" align="alignleft" width="473"] Nordgarden playing the Royal Albert Hall[/caption]

item.title: Live & jivin' for 10.000 people
item.dc:creator: Nordgarden
item.content:encoded:
We're happy to publish the first video from the epic concert we did this Summer opening up for A-HA in Hamar on August 14th in front of more than 10.000 people. Yeah!
https://youtu.be/Y6gwUndswps

item.title: Norwegian Christmas Single
item.dc:creator: Nordgarden
item.content:encoded: Nordgarden just released a Christmas single in Norwegian, titled "Du kan vel komme hjem til jul" - meaning "You could come home for Christmas". The lyrics was written by Pål Frøiland and the music was composed by Nordgarden. You may listen to it here on SPOTIFY -  "Du kan vel komme hjem til jul" - and all other digital platforms. Merry Christmas to you all!
